price: 47. En niemand van jullie zou Ons van (de bestraffing) van hem kunnen tegenhouden.
arabic: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ عَنۡهُ حَٰجِزِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: famā minkum min aḥadin ʿanhu ḥājizīna
